items.title: Apple is reportedly willing to lose $1 billion every year just to fuel its streaming ambitions
items.description: Unlike other peers, the streaming service's small library focuses almost exclusively on original content like Severance and Ted Lasso.

items.title: This nutrition expert avoids a so-called health food at all costs: he says you’re better going full fat instead
items.description: Low-fat yogurt often contains artificial sweeteners and added sugar and flavors.

items.title: Trump hints at ‘flexibility’ on reciprocal tariffs while balking at more ‘exceptions’
items.description: Stock indexes rebounded from a morning selloff after Trump’s tariff comments to finish the day with narrow gains.
